content:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• New crypto bill hits the Senate, and it’s a big fucking deal.
• It clarifies tokens, slaps down bad regs, and gives crypto some actual respect.
• If this passes, the U.S. might finally stop screwing over innovation and lead the damn space.

Impact — This bill could flip the script on U.S. crypto policy, turning the country into a global hub instead of a regulatory dumpster fire.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2025/09/05/legislation-steering-u-s-fate-of-crypto-emerges-in-new-version-in-senate
